## Why care about effect modification

![](images/clipboard-742917807.png)

-   不同效应修饰因子人群中 的因果效应不同，影响结果外推
-   寻找干预最益的人群,有助于新机制的发现

## Stratification as a form of adjustment

In summary, standardization (or IP weighting) is used to adjust for L and stratification is used to identify effect modification by V .
